jobs.title: Senior Data Scientist-Computer Vision
jobs.job_description:
We are seeking a dynamic and innovative Image Scientist with 8-13 years of experience in the Data Science and AI industry to join our team in Kolkata, West Bengal. As an Image Scientist, you will play a crucial role in driving thought leadership and innovation in the field of image processing and analysis. This position offers a unique opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and contribute to the growth and success of Adani while fostering a culture of excellence and collaboration.

Roles and Responsibilities
As an Image Scientist at Adani, you will be responsible for:
- Developing and implementing advanced algorithms and models for image recognition, segmentation, and feature extraction.
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and optimize image processing pipelines and workflows.
- Contributing to the development and enhancement of AI-based systems for image interpretation and understanding.
- Utilizing machine learning and deep learning techniques to extract meaningful insights from image data.
- Evaluating and validating the performance of image processing algorithms through rigorous testing and analysis.
- Communicating complex technical concepts and findings to non-technical stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.
- Participating in the creation and maintenance of high-quality documentation and technical reports related to image science projects.
- Continuously exploring new methodologies and technologies to improve the efficiency and accuracy of image analysis processes.
- Adhering to industry best practices and standards while ensuring compliance with data privacy and security regulations.

Experience
- 8-13 years of experience in the Data Science and AI industry with a focus on image processing and analysis.

Education Qualification
- Bachelor or masterâ€™s degree or Ph.D in Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.

Certification required
- Certifications in machine learning, computer vision, or image processing would be an advantage.

Behavioural Skills
- Strong analytical and critical thinking skills.
- Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
- Effective communication and collaboration skills.
- Adaptability and willingness to learn and explore new technologies.

Technical Skills
- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java.
- Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries, such as TensorFlow, Keras, or PyTorch.
- Working knowledge of image processing tools and libraries, such as OpenCV, scikit-image, or PIL.
- Familiarity with deep learning architectures and techniques for image analysis.
- Experience with cloud platforms and services for data storage and processing, such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.

Non-Negotiable Skills
- Proficiency in image processing techniques and computer vision algorithms
- Advanced knowledge of machine learning, deep learning, and neural networks
- Cloud development and deployment of AI systems.

jobs.title: Senior - Digital
jobs.job_description: As part of EY GDS Assurance Digital, you will be responsible for implementing innovative ideas through AI research to develop high growth impactful products. You will be helping EYâ€™s sector and service line professionals by developing analytics enabled solutions, integrating data science activities with business relevant aspects to gain insight from data. You will work with multi-disciplinary teams across the entire region to support global clients. This is a core full-time AI developer role, responsible for creating innovative solutions by applying AI based techniques for business problems.

jobs.title: Manager/Senior Manager, Data Science Specialist
jobs.job_description: This role requires a seasoned professional as a Senior Manager, to spearhead our data science initiatives, drive innovation, and leverage advanced analytics to optimize business strategies with a focus on the Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance (BFSI) sector. Responsibilities include providing thought leadership, developing and executing comprehensive data science strategies, designing predictive models, utilizing advanced analytics, collaborating with business stakeholders, and mentoring junior team members.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.job_description: We are seeking a talented and driven Data Scientist to join our team and contribute to the development of advanced analytics solutions, including fraud detection, stream analytics, and predictive modelling. The ideal candidate will have 3-5 years of hands-on experience designing and deploying machine learning models and a passion for uncovering insights from data. In this role, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineering, product, and data science, to create and optimize data pipelines, develop innovative analytics models, and enhance our understanding of complex patterns in digital payments and beyond. Familiarity with digital payments, fraud detection, Gen AI, and real-time data processing is a strong advantage.

jobs.title: Digital Data Scientist - Manager
jobs.job_description: As part of EY GDS Assurance Digital, you will be responsible for implementing innovative ideas through AI research to develop high growth & impactful products. You will be helping EY's sector and service line professionals by developing analytics enabled solutions, integrating data science activities with business relevant aspects to gain insight from data. You will work with multi-disciplinary teams across the entire region to support global clients. This is a core full-time AI developer role, responsible for creating innovative solutions by applying AI based techniques for business problems. As our in-house senior AI engineer, your expertise and skills will be vital in our ability to steer one of our Innovation agenda.

jobs.title: Big Data Engineer - PySpark & Delta Lake on Microsoft Fabric
jobs.job_description: We are seeking a highly skilled Big Data Engineer with deep expertise in migrating complex SQL stored procedures to PySpark on Microsoft Fabric, and extensive experience in Delta Lake. The ideal candidate will be responsible for translating existing SQL-based logic into efficient PySpark workflows, managing large-scale data operations, and ensuring seamless orchestration of these workflows through the application layer. This role is crucial to optimizing our data management processes by moving away from SQL-based operations and leveraging the scalability and efficiency of distributed data processing using PySpark on Microsoft Fabric.

jobs.title: Data Analyst / Sr. Data Analyst
jobs.job_description: At CoreInsightsAI we are looking for a Data Analyst who will be the vital link between our information technology capacity and our business objectives by supporting and ensuring the successful completion of analytical, building, testing and deployment tasks of our product's features. The ideal candidate will use their passion for big data and analytics to provide insights to the business covering a range of topics. They will be responsible for conducting both recurring and ad hoc analysis for business user. Understand the day-to-day issues that our business faces, which can be better understood with data. Compile and analyze data related to business issues. Develop clear visualizations to convey complicated data in a straightforward fashion.
